doc.title: Haig Road Food Centre Imprompto Lunch Session
doc.text: Haig/NNP Road/NNP Food/NNP Centre/NN will/MD be/VB closing/VBD in/IN Aug/NN for/IN renovations/NN ,/, so/RB we/PRP had/VBD to/TO go/VB down/VB at/IN least/RB one/CD last/JJ time/NN to/TO visit/VB all/RB the/DT famous/JJ stalls/NNS there/RB ./.
